titleStmt.title: The dolefull lamentation of cheap-side crosse: or old England sick of the staggers. The dissenting, and disagreeing in matters of opinion, together with the sundry sorts of sects now raving and reigning, being the maine causes of the disturbance and hinderance of the Common-wealth.

notesStmt.note: Title page has a woodcut of Cheapside cross.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
